messages.subject: text chat Friday morning ("morning" at my house)
messages.msgSnippet: The old chatroom company went out of business.  I m using a new one. You can choose the color of your name.  We lose the international flags.  But the GOOD
messages.messageBody:
The old chatroom company went out of business. I'm using a new one.
You can choose the color of your name. We lose the international
flags. But the GOOD NEWS is that you can enlarge the fonts as you see
them with the same old command+
Some people couldn't read the other one well because the font was dinky.



Same address
http://sandradodd.com/room

Same password
goodidea

But a different chatroom--follow the link.

Sandra

Two hours, beginning:

Pacific: 9:00 am Friday
Mountain: 10:00 am Friday
Central: 11:00 am
Eastern: 12:00 noon
Greenwich Mean Time (England) 5:00 pm Friday

Pune, India: 9:30 pm Friday

NSW, Australia: 2:00 AM Saturday

New Zealand: 4:00 AM Saturday


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
